messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Suit sensors and swiss cheese.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Life is boring.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: First off crew, full power to them thrusters we have, we're going full speed into that sun down there.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Warehouse.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There are three heads of staff, and we are all moths. Welcome to Moth station 13, we are you overlords.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Yeett we are all moth emperoooors'.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: !sdrolrevo ruoy era eW

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: How is the bluespace artillery doing?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Five seconds

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: I took away my fancy access, happy? I'm keeping this flame retardant suit though.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whazzup my diggles, i'm the emperor now.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All the lights are down, we moths are in danger, we have no guidance, quick we must abandon to the light filled station of Centcomm
